TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindUITypeEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Representa que está asociado a las propiedades que se enlazan o se pueden enlazar en una actividad.

span.span: Represents a that is associated with the properties that are bound, or can be bound, on an activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] Cuando los usuarios indican que desean modificar los valores de propiedad, el **ActivityBind** abre el cuadro de diálogo para ayudar a especificar el enlace de propiedades en una actividad.When users indicate that they want to edit property values, the **ActivityBind** dialog box opens to help in specifying the binding of properties on an activity.
